cn.edu.uestc.acmicpc.db.dao.iface

Interface IDAO<Entity extends Serializable,PK extends Serializable>

  • Type Parameters:
    Entity - Entity's type
    PK - Primary key's type
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IArticleDAO, ICodeDAO, ICompileInfoDAO, IContestDAO, IContestProblemDAO, IContestTeamInfoDAO, IContestUserDAO, IDepartmentDAO, ILanguageDAO, IMessageDAO, IProblemDAO, IProblemTagDAO, IStatusDAO, ITagDAO, ITrainingContestDAO, ITrainingStatusDAO, ITrainingUserDAO, IUserDAO, IUserSerialKeyDAO
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DAO

    public interface IDAO<Entity extends Serializable,PK extends Serializable>
    Global DAO interface.

      • findAll

        List<?> findAll(String fields,
              Condition condition)
                throws AppException
        List all entities in tables by fields name and condition entity.

        For developers: The return list's element type is Object[], every element of the array is the field value.

        Parameters:
        fields - fields name for query.
        condition - condition entity for DB query.
        Returns:
        result list.
        Throws:
        AppException

      • getEntityByUniqueField

        Object getEntityByUniqueField(String fieldName,
                            Object value)
                              throws AppException
        Get unique entity by the field name, if the field is not unique field, throw AppException.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - the unique field name
        value - field's value
        Returns:
        unique result, null if not exist
        Throws:
        AppException

      • getEntityByUniqueField

        Object getEntityByUniqueField(String fieldName,
                            Object value,
                            String propertyName,
                            boolean forceUnique)
                              throws AppException
        Get unique entity by the field name, if the field is not unique field, throw AppException.
        Parameters:
        fieldName - the unique field name
        value - field's value
        propertyName - property's name for JoinColumn
        forceUnique - force the field's unique property
        Returns:
        unique result, null if not exist
        Throws:
        AppException

                                          BaseBuilder<T> builder,
                                          Condition condition)
                                        throws AppException
        List all entity in condition for specific DTO type.
        Parameters:
        clazz - DTO class type.
        builder - DTO's builder, should extends from BaseBuilder.
        condition - DB query condition.
        Returns:
        DTO list for this query.
        Throws:
        AppException
